overview:
Shiv is the founder of Pepkick, a platform focused on simplifying digital commerce through personalised product discovery and distribution.

Shiv is an experienced leader with broad experience in digital space - including Product Management, Monetization and Strategy Development. Focus on identifying business opportunities around emerging technologies and leading teams to design great products to address them. Strong passion for innovation and entrepreneurship with an affinity for public speaking and product evangelism.

Shiv has been with AOL since 2005, holding roles which have been responsible for managing and improving the product portfolio, Shiv currently leads the EU Products & Innovation group to bring new products to market globally, enabling AOL to offer compelling consumer experiences and effective advertising solutions.

Prior to AOL, Shiv worked for GE (General Electric), building and managing various data mining and analytics products for various divisions of GE.
